nodes.text: Patijak Sonn was the author of the book Kholemi Elaru. For a time, it was the fourth best-selling book on a list compiled by HoloNet News (CoCo Town Edition) on the date 13:2:28.

Patijak Sonn was first mentioned in HoloNet News Vol. 531 #45, a 2002 in-universe website created to publicize the upcoming Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones film. Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens wrote the site content.
